meanings.definition: To reverse the action of shifting.
meanings.sent1: She quickly unshifts the gears in the car.
meanings.sent2: After parking, he unshifts the car from reverse to neutral.
meanings.sent3: The magician unshifts the cards to reveal the chosen one.
meanings.sent4: He unshifts his focus from work to family time.
meanings.sent5: The detective unshifts the evidence to solve the case.

meanings.definition: To move back to the original position.
meanings.sent1: The toy car unshifts when you press the button again.
meanings.sent2: The lever unshifts automatically when released.
meanings.sent3: The cat unshifts from the cozy spot to follow its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her mood unshifts from happy to thoughtful.
meanings.sent5: The sun unshifts behind the clouds, brightening the day.

meanings.sent1: He unshifts the changes made to the document.
meanings.sent2: The software allows you to unshift edits before saving.
meanings.sent3: The chef unshifts the seasoning in the dish, making it bland.
meanings.sent4: She unshifts her decision after hearing new information.
meanings.sent5: The student unshifts the wrong answer to the correct one.
